structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
FINANCE AND REVENUE OF CITIES OF THE FIRST CLASS

law.text: A city of the first class, consolidated local government, or urban-county government may establish one (1) or more management districts pursuant to KRS 91.750 to 91.762, for the purpose of providing and financing economic improvements that specially benefit property within the management district.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 119, sec. 2, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 123, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 297, sec. 2, effective July 13, 1990.
